title: New Dell Inspiron
content:
Any know what typeface they are using in the new dell inspiron campaign.

Examples are here: [http://i.dell.com/img.aspx?p=LnE%2bkEwANWp%2fXl2az%2fFtwdrfofMtWveEk0AUh...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107165129/http:/i.dell.com/img.aspx?p=LnE%2bkEwANWp%2fXl2az%2fFtwdrfofMtWveEk0AUhNyobceOmd64JFi4vqEQUNWIuGzFjpn0pTxE4P7vCxqTzb1tjNDU8f4hWbu2pREbgtv%2bcsfU1vm%2fPEf1tagRG5nHpWTA3NT3ogpr7eP4GgXCmP9r0tSZvKUgUbe0%2fUB2mNylbs%2fh0vu5PBb6vrYHRpvJqDyA9dLutGoUrbikFlzKiuYzmpGb9LQhU7Kl%2fUAFwpjzIY2N "http://i.dell.com/img.aspx?p=LnE%2bkEwANWp%2fXl2az%2fFtwdrfofMtWveEk0AUhNyobceOmd64JFi4vqEQUNWIuGzFjpn0pTxE4P7vCxqTzb1tjNDU8f4hWbu2pREbgtv%2bcsfU1vm%2fPEf1tagRG5nHpWTA3NT3ogpr7eP4GgXCmP9r0tSZvKUgUbe0%2fUB2mNylbs%2fh0vu5PBb6vrYHRpvJqDyA9dLutGoUrbikFlzKiuYzmpGb9LQhU7Kl%2fUAFwpjzIY2N")

and here: [http://global.synapsegroup.com/dell/july07/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107165129/http:/global.synapsegroup.com/dell/july07/ "http://global.synapsegroup.com/dell/july07/")

Thanks
author: voiceof

comments.content: Thanks for the help. You know, often as I've heard that name; I've never actually looked that one up. Can anyone provide me with typefaces that have a similar feel, I'm looking for a typeface for a marketing company that does a lot of web based things and wants to be seen as progressive but solid and trustworthy. If you have any other suggestions for a different feel I would appreciate those as well.
Stewf, are you aware of a way how to avoid the Fontshop redirects Non-Americans are confronted with? That would make link lists like that a lot more useful … Thanks.

I wish I could wave a magic wand and it would be fixed, but because Germans, Norwegians, and Austrians each have their own FontShop site there are jurisdiction issues. Fortunately, you should be able to reach FontShop.com if you click the link a second time.

Thanks for the answer. Yeah, I know about that ‘2nd click trick’, and yes, the purpose of the redirect is well understood—still I find it annoying. Find myself rejoicing everytime a font reference on typophile is made to myfonts, Vllg, Linotype &c. That isn’t in the interest of neither FontShop.com nor FontShop.de, I bet.
